Description:
Our client is a fast-growing SaaS start-up. They are now looking for an Enterprise Sales Account Manager â€“ KSA to join them. Roles & Responsibilities:Generating new business opportunities and expanding existing customer networks in the enterprise segment

Building strong relationships with decision-makers and influencers at enterprise accounts, and positioning the company as a trusted and strategic partner
Developing and executing account plans and sales strategies to address customer pain points and deliver value-added solutions
Reporting on sales activities and pipeline status using our CRM systemSalary: SAR 20000 - SAR 25000Skills
Skills:
5+ years of experience in sales or business development within a fast-paced B2B SaaS enterprise
Proven track record of selling software / SaaS/web services into large Enterprise accounts
A solid network and connections in Saudi Arabia 
Must be a Saudi National or resident of the Saudi
Strong presentation and listening skills: comfortable presenting and negotiating with senior executives (C-level)
